div.p:
Every user is member of one trial site and a trial site can participate at many trials. Only users from a participating site can take part at a trial (e.g. randomize, ...).
It is possible to deactivate a trial site, with the following implications:

ul.li: every user of the trial site is deactivated
users of a deactivated site can't log in
it is not possible to register if the site is deactivated

div.p: A trial site contains the following properties:

tr.td: The name of the trial site.
The street of the trial site.
The post code of the trial site.
The city of the trial site.
The country of the trial site.
The password of the trial site, this is necessary for the self registration process of users.
